system.description: Vertical opaque wall of seven colors. Creatures with less than 8 HD within 20 ft. are blinded 2d4 rounds if they look. Each color has an effect (red: 20 fire, orange: 40 acid, yellow: 80 electricity, green: poison, blue: petrify, indigo: insanity, violet: banish). Wall 4 ft./level wide, 2 ft./level high. Destroyed color by color in order. Antimagic does not penetrate.
